data.title: Cympad Cellular Foam Cymbal Washers
meta_keywords: buy Cympads at your favorite local or online drumshop
top professional drummers rely on Cympad
Improve Cymbal Sound And Performance With Cympad
data.meta_description: Available in Optimizer, Moderator and Chromatic Series, Cympads are an incredible, affordable and easy to use system for optimizing the sound and performance of virtually all cymbal sizes, types and brands.
